Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "How's the commandant doing?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Doing well, even finished two special meals in a row. But the virus inside is in an abnormal state that has never been observed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Don't worry, the virus is still being suppressed by the immune serum, so it won't affect your dear commandant's health.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But the virus keeps releasing signal units, forming a...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov glances at Lucia while speaking, but she seems to be too worried for the commandant to notice him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After the channel is connected by Constructs, the Ascendants would simulate the connection of consciousness between Constructs and the commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is there no way to cut off the connection?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Well, I'd hate to admit that, but we don't have such technology right now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Now that the security is ensured, what are you going to do with our commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'To become your guinea pig for research?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Why are you soldiers always like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Put away all thoughts of fighting. We've got enough data samples, so we don't need to do any human experiments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Secondly, to ensure the safety of your commandant and let us be able to respond promptly if there is a danger in this channel.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'We got to take him in temporarily. This has been communicated to your commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Alright, I got to keep working on finding the solution, get out of my way.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov makes his way through the Gray Raven members, then stops at the corner behind them after walking a few steps.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Although it's called isolation, I didn't say that you can't visit him. Do I have to just say it?", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's all I have to report.", 3: '45'}
{2: "I'm counting on you guys.", 3: '46'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'You must take care of yourself, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'They leave, and the pale isolation room becomes silent again, the ticking sound of electronic devices comes from all sides of the room.'}
{3: 'Tick-tock—Tick-tock. The familiar sounds come to mind. Someone is approaching, and someone is leaving.'}
{3: 'Opening your eyes, you are still surrounded by white walls and instruments, with no one else here.'}
{3: 'An electronic clock above the door of the isolation room shows the present time—1:28 a.m.'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Connection signal detected, Construct is connected successfully.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'What are you planning?', 3: '63'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Gotta do my job.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you Ascendants planning something again?', 3: '66'}
{2: 'Your connection is under our control.', 3: '68'}
{2: 'α', 3: "As expected, and it won't affect me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I'll often send you a link like this in the future.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Looks like I don't I have the right to refuse.", 3: '72'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Maybe you do, maybe you don't. Who knows.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Well, then. I'll see you later.", 4: '1'}
